Name: Biotech Samurai
About the game: / / You lost everything in your life - your body, your skin and even your voice! Welcome to Biotech Samurai - a third person swordplay game in cyberpunk style. You need to find who did that to you and come with full vendetta! We were inspired by samurai and cyberpunk games and Biotech Samurai was created by ONE MAN ONLY!!! Key Features: - Very difficult - Great environment worlds using Unreal engine! - Fearsome enemies - Big-bosses - Cool samurai animations for attacks - And more...
